channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Erica Ash, ‘Survivor’s Remorse’ and ‘Real Husbands of Hollywood’ Actor, dies at 46
item.description: Actor and comedian Erica Ash has died at age 46. She was best known for MADtv, the sitcom Survivor's Remorse and The Big Gay Sketch Show.
item.content:encoded:
Actor and comedian Erica Ash has died at age 46. She was best known for MADtv, the sitcom Survivor's Remorse and The Big Gay Sketch Show.

(Image credit: Rodin Eckenroth
)
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Blair

item.title: Covid hits British Olympic swimming star who had close contact with U.S. athlete
item.description: Adam Peaty tested positive for COVID a day after joining American Nic Fink at a press conference after the 100 meter breaststroke final. USA Swimming say it's "taking the necessary precautions."
item.content:encoded:
Adam Peaty tested positive for COVID a day after joining American Nic Fink at a press conference after the 100 meter breaststroke final. USA Swimming say it's "taking the necessary precautions."

(Image credit: Matthias Schrader)
item.dc:creator: Brian Mann

item.title: U.S. women’s basketball team opens the Olympics with dominant win over Japan
item.description: The U.S. women's Olympic basketball team cruised over Japan 102-76. The U.S. squad, which now boasts a 56-game Olympic winning streak, is on the hunt for an eighth-straight Olympic gold medal.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. women's Olympic basketball team cruised over Japan 102-76. The U.S. squad, which now boasts a 56-game Olympic winning streak, is on the hunt for an eighth-straight Olympic gold medal.

(Image credit: Sameer Al-Doumy)
item.dc:creator: Juana Summers

item.title: Democrats weigh in on Harris' pick for running mate
item.description: Congressional Democrats tout their favorites on Harris' short list. Sen. Tim Kaine, who was Clinton's running mate, says accelerated vetting means fewer options.
item.content:encoded: Congressional Democrats tout their favorites on Harris' short list. Sen. Tim Kaine, who was Clinton's running mate, says accelerated vetting means fewer options.
item.dc:creator: Deirdre Walsh

item.title: Iowa is the latest state to impose tighter limits on abortion access
item.description: On Monday, Iowa's ban on abortions as early as six weeks takes effect — sending ripple effects on access to abortion throughout the Midwest.
item.content:encoded: On Monday, Iowa's ban on abortions as early as six weeks takes effect — sending ripple effects on access to abortion throughout the Midwest.
item.dc:creator: Natalie Krebs

item.title: Paris Olympics: Brittney Griner is back
item.description: The U.S. women's basketball team begins its quest for an unprecedented eighth straight Olympic gold medal. The squad opens at the Paris Olympics with a game against Japan.
item.content:encoded: The U.S. women's basketball team begins its quest for an unprecedented eighth straight Olympic gold medal. The squad opens at the Paris Olympics with a game against Japan.
item.dc:creator: Juana Summers

item.title: Kamala Harris' friend talks about how their childhood shaped her
item.description: NPR's Ari Shapiro talks with Kamala Harris' childhood friend, Carole Porter, about how their upbringing in a redlined Bay Area neighborhood shaped Harris.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Ari Shapiro talks with Kamala Harris' childhood friend, Carole Porter, about how their upbringing in a redlined Bay Area neighborhood shaped Harris.
item.dc:creator: Jonaki Mehta

item.title: Protesters take to the streets in Venezuela over contested presidential election
item.description: Venezuela’s electoral authorities made it official: Socialist President Nicolás Maduro will be in office for another six years. Opposition leaders are crying foul as protests break out.
item.content:encoded:
Venezuela’s electoral authorities made it official: Socialist President Nicolás Maduro will be in office for another six years. Opposition leaders are crying foul as protests break out.

(Image credit: Matias Delacroix)
item.dc:creator: Carrie Kahn

item.title: FBI says gunman’s actions show careful planning ahead of Trump rally
item.description: The FBI says it's still working on its investigation into the attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump. The bureau has provided an update on what it has uncovered so far.
item.content:encoded: The FBI says it's still working on its investigation into the attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump. The bureau has provided an update on what it has uncovered so far.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Lucas

item.title: Eurosport drops an Olympics commentator over sexist remarks about Australian swimmers
item.description: Bob Ballard's on-air comments—referencing Australian swimmers who had just won gold—drew sharp criticism on social media. Eurosport later said it had taken the veteran commentator off of their Olympics coverage.
item.content:encoded:
Bob Ballard's on-air comments—referencing Australian swimmers who had just won gold—drew sharp criticism on social media. Eurosport later said it had taken the veteran commentator off of their Olympics coverage.

(Image credit: Petr David Josek)
item.dc:creator: Emma Bowman
